title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 154.5 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 154.5 - Confidentiality

State Regulations
OCA shall keep confidential all
information submitted to it which is subject of or part of an exemption request
pursuant to this Part, and shall release such information only upon
authorization of a court of competent jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
154.5

Adopted

New

York State Register February 3, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 05, eff. 12/31/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
